string-array.name: information
string-array.item: I wrote my first line of code\n two years ago.
Someone has written a Wikipedia\n page about me.
I am a type one diabetic.
I have made my living playing\n professional sports for 14 years.
I have a French Bulldog named Harley.
I prefer books over online\n resources as a learning tool.
I am a huge Harry Potter fanatic.
I want to find a workplace where\n I feel that I make a difference.
